import os
import pandas as pd
from sqlalchemy.sql._elements_constructors import true
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pygwalker as pyg
import seaborn as sns


df = pd.read_csv(r'parkinson/parkinsons_updrs.data')
df.tail(10)

verify_column = df.columns
print(verify_column)

df = df[df['age'] < 50]

df['sex'].astype('str')

df['sex'] = df['sex'].replace({0: 'Male', 1: 'Female'})

plt.figure(figsize=(8, 6))
sns.histplot(data=df, x="sex")

plt.title('Distribuition of Parkinson', size='15', col='darkgreen')
plt.xlabel('Gender', size='12', col='darkblue')
plt.ylabel('Number of Pacients', size= '12')
plt.show()
